thread.title: Hilarious holiday fails caught on camera
thread.title_full: Hilarious holiday fails caught on camera

title: Hilarious holiday fails caught on camera
text: comments From thrills and spills on the water to animal attacks - taking a vacation can be more stressful than a day in the office, for some holidaymakers. Whether they're enjoying a cruise or going camping, no tourist is safe from a hilarious slip up, ready to be caught on camera. MailOnline Travel has rounded up a selection of the most amusing holiday fails, from African safaris to American forests and camp sites, causing a sensation online. Shocking pictures include a pair of amorous elephants who don't seem fazed by the safari tourists on their backs and a disastrous video of a wakeboarder attempting a stunt without looking where he's going. Other images show a troop of mischievous monkeys on safari and a seagull at the beach stealing unsuspecting daytrippers' clothing. Other pictures include a horse making itself at home in someone's tent and a camper falling asleep dangerously close to a fire. Read on to see the pictures and videos that won't have you wishing you were there. On your head: A bikini-clad holidaymaker hurtles out of an inflatable as it's towed along by a boat Like a flash sale at a clothing store, a troop of baboons raid a safari tourist's overhead luggage spilling the contents across the ground, much to her horror Tourists riding on the backs of a pair of elephants get more than they bargained for on a jungle trek Look where you're driving! A toppled vehicle on Fraser Island, Australia, sinks into a sandbank filled with flowing water Hilarious - yet painful - footage shows a man wakeboarding past his friend's boat, missing the beer thrown at him and slamming into a wooden post A camper curls up and falls asleep by the log fire. The only problem - the log is on fire Going, going...gone: A cruise passenger struggles to surf on a flowrider and is swept away by a wave Hold on to your hat: A cheeky seagull steals a holidaymaker's cap on a trip to the beach Making tracks: Two tents have been sprayed with mud by a vehicle on this mucky campsite Legend of the fall: A white water rafting trip heads south when almost all of the occupants of the boat are tipped outside the raft Up close and personal: An over-friendly elephant plants its trunk on a holidaymaker's face Horse play: An inquisitive creature tramples through an unlucky camper's tent Off-road misadventures: This image of an RV stuck on a muddy track was shared with the caption 'Thanks Apple Maps' Share or comment on this article Most watched News videos
